name: I need some smoke
description:
Hello everyone, i am an indie game developer from Ukraine, i have 17 years  and now live in Poland where i have all to make games and improve myself in it.  I spent 2 months making this, and this is my first Unreal Engine game so i hope you'll enjoy it. This is the first playable build, everything will improve and i'm planning to make new updates recently, even port game on android, to Google Play Market.

What you have to do?

In this game you have to collect bottles to make some money, cause someone who said that he is god told you to make this to buy cigarettes, or you will die, so i think we have to listen to him, he is very persuasive...

This game was made more for speedruns,  soon i'll add a high score and much more Waiting forward to your feedback and ideas :3
